item.title: Addiction Manifested - My opinion of Mang0's recent behaviours
item.description:
Preface

I do NOT condone what Mang0 did. I also think that although Ludwig did give a good response to what happened, really crossed over calling it what it was on stream: sexual assault. Mang0 going around the Beerio Kart venue to women who were streaming and air-humping them/humping objects close to their faces and bodies is sexual assault. Mang0 is a husband (I think? I am still unsure if he ever got married) and has a child that looks up to him. He knows it’s inexcusable, and although he did a better job expressing this in the second twitter apology, this is something that shouldn’t have happened in the first place.
